revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=TP-LINK |model=EAP320 |revision=v1.x |asin=B01CTD1GL2 |newegg=N82E16833704318 |price=150 |fcc_date=11/09/2016 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |type=enterprise access point |fcc_id=TE7EAP320 |id_id=8853A-EAP320 |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=2.5 |pwr_poe=at |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM53015A1;BCM53015A1KFEBG, TT1507 P13, 452722-03 B1A; |cpu1_cspeed=800 |fla1=32 |fla1_brand=Winbond |fla1_model=W25Q256FVFG |ram1=256 |ram1_brand=SK hynix |ram1_model=H5TQ2G63GFR |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM43520 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi2_chip1_model=BCM43520 |wi2_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL |wi2_txchains=2 |wi2_rxchains=2 |wi2_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu= |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=1 |addl_chips= |flags=TurboQAM, |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin }}
:• '''867Mbps''' - 2SS 5GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11ac#Data_rates_and_speed 802.11ac] (80MHz chan.), :• '''300Mbps''' - 2SS 2.4GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11n-2009#Data_rates 802.11n] (40MHz chan.) = '''''1200 Mbps'' class'''
{{TagLine|AC1200 Wireless Dual Band Gigabit Ceiling Mount Access Point}} :{{ProductPage|http://www.tp-link.com/us/products/details/EAP320.html}}{{SupportPage|vendor=TP-LINK|model=EAP320}} Despite claims of TurboQAM support on the product page, :only 300Mbps is claimed for 2.4GHz 802.11n. Chip IDs in the FCC photos are illegible so the BCM53015A1 CPU :is just a guess based on what is in the similar EAP330 model. The BCM43520 radios are a guess based on what is paired with :this CPU in other 2x2 enterprise access points. {{see also|TP-LINK EAP330 v1.x}}
